mdRecord.dcterms:description: Originally built as the office of a realty company. Converted into a private residence in 1933 for Karl Bickel, then owner of United Press. -- https://web.archive.org/web/20070216142028/http://www.flheritage.com/facts/reports/places/index.cfm?fuseaction=ListAreas&county=Sarasota [work]
Razed 2000 to make way for the Sarasota Ritz-Carlton Hotel. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burns_Realty_Company%E2%80%93Karl_Bickel_House [work]
